overview: TITAN's official Mascot, Boner, wasn't named by accident! He finds the biggest bones around for the studio. That's exactly what we see in TITAN Media's new release: BONER! "Man's Best Friend", where Boner shows us four scenes filled with great big BONERS. TITAN's cast of hairy, hung masculine men includes Titan's Discoveries Eric Masterson, Lance Gear, Ric Hunter, Tom Vaccaro, Mike Roberts, Dean Coulter and Blake Harper. Director David Wexler puts this pack of manliness through their paces in two hours of passionate and sexually charged scenes.
title: Boner! Man's Best Friend
